casebody.data:
A & M Builders, Inc. et al., Appellees, v. City of Highland Heights, Appellant.

[Cite as A & M Builders, Inc. v. Highland Hts. (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 279.]

(No. 00-420 Submitted June 7, 2000 Decided July 12, 2000.) Grendell & Simon Co., L.P.A, and Timothy J. Grendell, for appellees. Timothy G. Paluf Director of Law, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed.

The cause is remanded for application of Home Builders Assn. of Dayton & the Miami Valley v. Beavercreek (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 121, 729 N.E.2d 349.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.
